item.description:
Jurgen Kluft Senior Software Engineer

Shanghai, 12/02/2020

As an enthousiast of technology and software development I was thrilled to hear that apart from the succesfull game PUBG you are also working on a new game and technology. I am confident I can help with working and improving the technology in many areas, from tools to runtime. I have worked on many engines, from UE3 to UE4 as well as many proprietary engines.

Jurgen Kluft
Senior Software Engineer

Shanghai, 12/02/2020

As an enthousiast of technology and software development i was thrilled to here that apart from the succesfull game PUBG you are also working on a new game and technology. I am confident I can help with working and improving the technology in many areas, from tools to runtime. I have worked on many engines, from UE3 to UE4 as well as many proprietary engines.
